title: BLACK FRIDAY DEAL: 50% OFF with promo code BLACK_FRIDAY
content:
If you still have not purchased Pixquare already, it is time now. Use promo code BLACK_FRIDAY to get the deal.

If you already purchased Pixquare, I wish you a lovely day with lots of joy and pixels :)

Best
App creator, Son Nguyen

(This promotion lasts until November 30)

title: Crash when pasting in another file
content: There is a known bug in v2.45.0 that crashes the app when pasting content from one file to another. It has been found and fixed. The App Store reviewing process is pending. I'll update again once the update is available.
